Spells:
Acid Splash (S0 Conj): R60' Single target or 2 adjacent targets suffer 4d6 HP acid (Dexterity neg)
Cloud Of Daggers (S2 Conj): R60' 5' cube inflicts 4d4 HP slashing for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +2d4 HP]
Color Spray (S1 Illu): 15' cone blinds 6d10 HP of targets for 1 rd [+Level affects +2d10 HP of targets]
Cone Of Cold (S5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (S4 Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack an adjacent creature/20% act normally (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level increases radius by 5']
Crown Of Madness (S2 Ench): R120' Self may order target's attacks each rd (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Disguise Self (B1 Illu): Self body and clothing appear different (Investigation detects) for 1 hr
Disintegrate (S6 Tran): R60' Target suffers 10d6+40 HP force and becomes dust if reduced to 0 HP (Dexterity neg); disintegrates large or smaller objects and magical forces [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Dominate Beast (S4 Ench): R60' Target obeys self telepathic commands (Wisdom neg; damage yields another save) for conc up to 1 min [+Level extends duration to 10 min/1 hr/8 hr at level 5/6/7]
Fear (S3 Illu): Creatures in a 30' cone flee (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Feather Fall (S1 Tran): R60' 5 falling targets slow to 60'/rd for 1 min
Fireball (S3 Evoc): R150' 20' radius inflicts 8d6 HP fire (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Friends (B0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward
Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward
Incendiary Cloud (S8 Conj): R150' 20' radius inflicts 10d8 HP fire (Dexterity half) and moves away 10'/rd for conc up to 1 min
Lightning Bolt (S3 Evoc): 100'x5' line inflicts 8d6 HP lightning (Dexterity half) and ignites unattended flammable objects [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Mage Armor (S1 Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr (target donning armor ends)
Mage Hand (S0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Mending (S0 Tran): Touch repairs a small break or tear
Message (S0 Tran): R120' Self and target may hold a whispered conversation for 1 rd
Meteor Swarm (S9 Evoc): R1 mile 4 40' radius areas each inflict 20d6 HP fire and 20d6 HP bludgeoning (Dexterity half) and ignite unattended flammable objects
Minor Illusion (S0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Move Earth (S6 Tran): R120' Reshapes a 40' cube of earth each 10 minutes for conc up to 2 hr
Poison Spray (S0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Constitution neg)
Polymorph (S4 Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wisdom neg; shapechanger immune) for conc up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Ray Of Frost (S0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Ray Of Sickness (S1 Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Reverse Gravity (S7 Tran): R100' Items in a 50' radius fall upward for conc up to 1 min
Seeming (S5 Illu): R30' Changes appearance of targets (Charisma neg; Investigation detects) for 8 hr
Shatter (S2 Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Telekinesis (S5 Tran): R60' Self may mentally move a 1000 lb object 30'/rd (Strength neg) for conc up to 10 min
Teleport (S7 Conj): R10' Target object or self and 8 allies teleport any distance
True Strike (B0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd
Witch Bolt (S1 Evoc): R30' Ranged spell inflicts 1d12 HP lightning/rd for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d12 HP initial]
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Bard): Knows 2 B0 spells/May cast chosen B1 spell 1/long rest
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 S0 spells/May cast chosen S1 spell 1/long rest
Arcane Exemplar Form: Discharge 6 runes for 40' Fly, +2 spell DC, resistance to spell damage, and regain HP from casting for 3 rd
Careful Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to protect 4 creatures from self spell
Essence Runes: Spending Sorcery Points charges 20 runes; 5 charged runes emit 5' light
Font Of Magic: May use 20 Sorcery Points/long rest/May convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Glyphs Of Aegis: Discharge runes to negate 1d6 damage each, touch can transfer 1 rune for 1 hr
Manifest Inscriptions: R15' Discharge 1 rune to reveal hidden glyphs
Quickened Spell: May spend 2 Sorcery Points to cast a spell as bonus action
Runic Torrent: Discharge spell level runes to overcome target resistance and immunity
Sigilic Augmentation: Discharge rune for Adv on Str, Dex, or Con checks for 1 rd
Sorcerous Restoration: Taking a short rest restores 4 Sorcery Points
Subtle Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast a spell w/out somatic or verbal components
Twinned Spell: May spend spell level Sorcery Points to add a second spell target
